Recommended Remediation: Deploy centralized software inventory tooling and reconcile monthly.

Gap Description: Access lifecycle not fully automated for contractors.
Recommended Remediation: Integrate IAM with HR and contractor onboarding systems.

Gap Description: Data-at-rest encryption is inconsistent across file shares.
Recommended Remediation: Expand encryption coverage and enforce key management standards.
Deploy internal network sensors and update logging scope.

Gap Description: Recovery objectives not defined for all systems.
Recommended Remediation: Define RTO/RPO for all critical services and test annually.

Gap Description: Post-incident review actions are not consistently tracked.
Recommended Remediation: Implement PIR tracking with ownership and due dates.
